(:action collect ; Collect a resource and update its state
  :parameters (?a - agent ?r - resource ?l - location)
  :precondition (and
    (at ?r ?l)
    (in ?a main_area)
    (not (collected ?r))
  )
  :effect (and
    (collected ?r)
    (not (at ?r ?l))

(:action lay ; Lay a resource and update its state
    :parameters (?resource - object ?agent - player)
    :precondition (and (prepared ?resource) (ready ?agent))
    :effect (and (utilized ?resource) (not (prepared ?resource))
